apps.graph
Class DFSConncomp<T>

java.lang.Object
  apps.graph.DFSConncomp<T>

public class DFSConncomp<T>
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements a DFS-based connected components algorithm on an undirected gaph.

Author:
Sesh Venugopal
